si.title: සමාන හසුරුව ඉහළට එනු ඇත්ද?
body_lines: ඉන්දියාව සහ එක්සත් ජනපදය චීන පර්යේෂණ නැව් ශ්රී ලංකාවට ගෙන යාමට අවශ්ය නැත

en.title: Will the equal handle come up?
body_lines: India and the United States do not want to carry out Chinese research ships to Sri Lanka

summary_lines: India and US oppose China's research vessels in Sri Lanka. This move aims to counterbalance China's growing influence in the region. The decision reflects strategic concerns about maritime security and economic interests.
